DataElement.preferredName: Target Disease or Disorder Anatomic Site
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The anatomical site of the target disease.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Target Disease or Disorder Anatomic Site
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An object fixed as a goal or point of examination; something to point at; a destination._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.:Named locations of or within the body.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An object fixed as a goal or point of examination; something to point at; a destination._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Concepts.definition: An object fixed as a goal or point of examination; something to point at; a destination.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: Named locations of, or within, the body.

Concepts.definition: Named locations of or within the body.

Property.changeDescription: Updated to point to NCI Thesaurus concept code.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: an anatomic location of a cancer lesion (including target, nontarget, and new lesions) in an individual being observed on a clinicial trial.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: locations or structures in the human body.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Named locations of, or within, the body.

Concepts.definition: Named locations of or within the body.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Reassignment of Representation term concept from C37901 (site) to C13717 (anatomic site) as part of structured caDSR harmonization activity 10/10/2006.
